document_data.caption: A map showing Mithtar in eastern Halruaa.
document_data.name: Mithtar
document_data.mainbody: '''Mithtar''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Mithtar was located in eastern Halruaa just west of the [[Muaraghal Mountains]]. The town sat on the southeast shore of [[Lake Maeru]] where the [[River Maeru]] flowed south from the lake.
